# Li-Ta Hsu (許立達) — LLM index

## Canonical
- Site: https://qmohsu.github.io/
- Email: lt.hsu@polyu.edu.hk
- ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0352-741X

## Summary
Li-Ta Hsu is an Associate Professor at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (AAE). He builds integrity-first navigation and sensor-fusion systems for embodied AI (robots, vehicles, drones). His work spans GNSS/PNT, urban navigation, multipath/NLOS mitigation, integrity monitoring, factor graph optimization, and multi-sensor fusion (GNSS/IMU/LiDAR/camera).

## Keywords
GNSS, PNT, RTK, PPP-RTK, urban canyon positioning, multipath mitigation, NLOS mitigation, integrity monitoring, factor graph optimization, GNSS/INS, sensor fusion, LiDAR, VIO, SLAM, smartphone GNSS, Android GNSS, embodied AI, autonomous systems, drones, robotics

## Current priorities (2025)
- Taiwan research partnerships
- Urban GNSS benchmarking
- Integrity monitoring for safety-critical applications
- Factor graph optimization research
- PhD/postdoc recruitment
